claim-modal.title: Claim rewards
claim-modal.subtitle: You are about to Claim Rewards. Your current reward - {reward}

deposit-modal.title: Deposit
deposit-modal.subtitle: Your funds will be redirected to the platform. Enter the desired amount, in case of the first transaction, you will need to authorize the transfer of funds.

info-bar.title: Coders
info-bar.subtitle: Group 1
info-bar.description: People who provide the intelligence to use the frontends, capital and compute.

capital-view.claim-at-note: Note: Claim is locked until the specified time

info-bar.title: Community
info-bar.subtitle: Group 2
info-bar.description: The people who create interfaces and tools for the Morpheus ecosystem are also part of its community.

community-view.withdraw-at-note: Note: Withdraw is locked until the specified time
community-view.claim-at-note: Note: Claim is locked until the specified time
community-view.dashboard-description: The reward will be claim automatically on withdrawal. Your share in the group will decrease, the award percentage will be reduced accordingly.

info-dashboard.connection-msg: Your personal investments and rewards will be displayed here after connecting your MetaMask wallet

invalid-network-modal.title: Invalid network
invalid-network-modal.subtitle: Your wallet is connected to the unsupported chain. Please, switch to another network:

validations.field-error_ether: Field must be amount of ether
validations.field-error_maxEther: Field must be within available amount of ether
validations.field-error_email: Field must be a valid email

withdraw-modal.title: Withdraw funds
withdraw-modal.subtitle: Specify the amount to be withdrawn. The funds will be sent to your wallet.

notification.default-message-warning: Something you are doing is not recommended
notification.default-message-info: Something is happening. Just want you to know that
